Nunchuk stick：
　　move around
Wiimote：
　　aiming／turning

Move your crosshair and turn using Wiimote.
Your corosshair is where you'll shots will fly
so don't lose sight of it.

You can dash and jump with Ｚ button
You can't jump while walking or dashing,
so put stick in neutral to jump

When spriting or jumping, mind the thruster gauge.
If your thrusters overheat you will be unable
to dash or jump until it cools down.

Rapid firing your weapon can overheat your
gun barrel, you won't be able to fire until it 
cools down.

During tutorial, you can press ＋ button
to read hints again or proceed to next lesson.

Once you have mastered basic movements,
proceed to learn about lock-on.

Press Ｃ button to lock-on your crosshair
to nearest enemy.

Lock on only centers your camera on target
your shots will still fly at crosshair.

Your mobile suit is also equiped with one or two 
sub-weapons.
Press － button to switch between sub-weapons 
and primary weapon.

Press Ｂ to fire selected sub-weapon
Some weapons have attached sub-weapon
which will replace 2nd sub-weapon (SUB2).

While most subweapons can be fired on move,
some can only be used when stationary.
Missles can perform lock-on by holding Ｂ button.

Some weapons can perform multi-lock to attack
multiple targets by holding Ｂ button.
ITs good to learn characteristics of your MS.

Press dpad to enter sniper mode.
Press it again to exit sniper mode.

While in Sniper mode, move stick forward 
to zoom-in, or backward to zoom-out.

Press － button to switch to sub-weapons.
If you have strong loing range sub-weapon, like 
cannon, it might be good to use it for sniping.

You can one-shot enemy MS by destroying its 
head in Sniper mode with strong attack.
In New Game+ you'l be able to obtain
enemy MS that way.

It can be easier to first weaken enemy MS head
with easier attacks before delivering headshot
in Sniper Mode.

Defeat instructor with all you have learned.
Use main weapon, sub-weapons, sniping, etc.

Ｂ button：shoot
Ｚ button：dash／jump
Ｃ button：Lock-on

This concludes basic tutorial.
Press ＋ button to open menu if you want to quit.
